interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Concealer Cream,Makeup concealer,Skin Lightening Whitening Cream,Waterproof Smooth Flawless Finish Creamy Concealer ,Suitable for s eye circles, striated lines, scars, acne, spots Review Date: 2019/10/31 Store: SCOBUTY Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Color': 'Ivory', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Package Dimensions': '7.72 x 5.43 x 0.47 inches; 2.05 Ounces', 'UPC': '778716277046'} Review Text: This 3 pack of cream concealer is well, very concealing! Its thick and maybe that is why it is a challenge to get out of the twist tube every time. I felt as though I was twisting forever before anything came out and then when it finally did, it wouldn't stop! It was like an explosion of concealer and it unfortunately seems to do this with every use. With this concealer, you don't need much of it or it will begin to looked 'caked on". I would recommend getting a small container ready to put the extra in before beginning to use it.
Because of the 3 pack, you can blend them to match almost any skin tone which is a great feature. The clear containers also is a great feature too! Review Title: Makeup concealer Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Flawless Finish Foundation, Colour Changing Foundation, All-Day Flawless Foundation Makeup, Covering Imperfections Liquid Complete Foundation, Suitable for ALL Skin Types CIDBEST {'Package Dimensions': '4.49 x 1.65 x 1.3 inches; 4.13 Ounces'} This makeup is crazy. It comes out of the bottle looking like a white colored moisturizer. When applied to the face, it immediately begins to blend with the color of the skin right before your eyes. It has somewhat of a weird smell if you put your nose up to the bottle. I didn't notice it once I applied or throughout the day. This makeup does not come off onto your clothes like regular foundation. It comes off the same way it went on. When applying it, it goes on more like moisturizer then makeup. Its got SPF in it so it takes an extra swipe or two to get it to completely blend in but when it does its so lightweight, you don't even notice its there. It just leaves your skin feeling soft and smooth. Oh and you don't get that later in the day shiney look with this makeup. It really is pretty cool stuff! Doesn't leave marks on clothes! Flawless Liquid Foundation Cream, Liquid Foundation, Colour Changing Foundation, BB Cream, Long Lasting, Invisible Pores, Base Nude Face Moisturizing Liquid Cover Concealer,Universal for ALL Skin Type Cherioll {'Brand': 'Cherioll', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Unit Count': '1.35 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '4.76 x 1.57 x 1.5 inches; 3.63 Ounces'} This foundation is like no other foundation. It is definitely not your average foundation. It blends in almost immediately with your own skin color because of this, it never looks caked on or leaves makeup lines around the jawline. It has an SPF coverage of 15 which is a nice added bonus. The foundation seems to leave a nice cross between matte and dewy while minimizing the pores. It is much more moisturizing then the average foundation also. My skin used to be on the dryer side and now I have normal skin thanks to this product. Colour Changing Foundation Rapid Reduction Eye Cream, Under Eye Cream, Under-Eye Bags Treatment, Instant Results within 120 Seconds, Rapidly Reducing Bagginess, Puffiness, Dark Circles and Wrinkles - 2Pcs CIDBEST {'Brand': 'CIDBEST', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Use for': 'Eyes', 'Skin Type': 'Oily, Sensitive, Dry, Normal', 'Package Dimensions': '3.6 x 1.1 x 0.8 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'UPC': '778299241700'} This under eye cream is amazing. The first time I used it, I could immediately see the difference. It says you must apply it and wait expressionless for the 2 minutes after but I didn't even have to wait two minutes to see that there was a noticeable difference.
Its easy to use, you just clip the plastic tip off and apply. There isn't a noticeable scent and the texture is soft and goes on smoothly but seems to soak in more abruptly then other eye creams. When I say abruptly, I mean it kind of almost begins to feel chalky or glue-ish when it begins to soak in. It leaves the skin feeling soft and smooth for the entire day.
I did notice that there isn't much for directions as to how often to apply it. Immediately see the difference... Concealer Cream,Makeup concealer,Skin Lightening Whitening Cream,Waterproof Smooth Flawless Finish Creamy Concealer ,Suitable for s eye circles, striated lines, scars, acne, spots SCOBUTY {'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Color': 'Ivory', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Package Dimensions': '7.72 x 5.43 x 0.47 inches; 2.05 Ounces', 'UPC': '778716277046'} This 3 pack of cream concealer is well, very concealing! Its thick and maybe that is why it is a challenge to get out of the twist tube every time. I felt as though I was twisting forever before anything came out and then when it finally did, it wouldn't stop! It was like an explosion of concealer and it unfortunately seems to do this with every use. With this concealer, you don't need much of it or it will begin to looked 'caked on". I would recommend getting a small container ready to put the extra in before beginning to use it.
Because of the 3 pack, you can blend them to match almost any skin tone which is a great feature. The clear containers also is a great feature too! Makeup concealer
profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Makeup Preferences:** The user continues to favor lightweight makeup products with moisturizing properties that blend seamlessly with their natural skin tone. Their interest in innovative products, such as color-changing foundations and versatile concealers, reflects a willingness to explore novel beauty solutions.

- **Key Features Valued:** They prioritize foundations and concealers that offer SPF protection, long-lasting wear, and non-transferable formulas. The user prefers a finish that balances matte and dewy without excessive shine and particularly values pore-minimizing benefits, especially following their transition from dry to normal skin.

- **Scent Sensitivity:** Sensitivity to product scent is noted but has not significantly affected their application experiences.

- **Skincare Interest:** The user has shown a growing interest in skincare products, specifically those addressing concerns like under-eye puffiness and dark circles. Their recent reviews indicate a focus on immediate visible results and ease of use, while noting any texture quirks in their products.

- **General Sentiment:** The user maintains a positive attitude towards experimentation and novelty in makeup and skincare, evaluating products based on effectiveness while acknowledging their drawbacks. Their balanced rating behavior suggests they appreciate products that meet their comfort and performance standards, recently giving high ratings to products that provide effective coverage without heaviness.

Overall, this profile reflects a user actively seeking innovative beauty and skincare solutions that enhance their routine while prioritizing comfort, blendability, and convenience.
